name: Sapphire Palace
description:
Sapphire Palace

A platformer where you play as Appu, a little ghost who is lost in the Sapphire Palace.

The palace is dwelled by evil ghosts that patrol the halls and corridors of the palace preventing anyone from escaping.

Help Appu dodge the other ghosts and escape the cursed palace.

Controls
  • P: move right
  • O: move left
  • Q: move up
  • A: move down
Objetive

Reach the door while you dodge the ghosts to complete the level and escape. Appu is a fragile ghost so each time he gets hit by an enemy he will return to the start of the level.

Reference

As requested for the 2022 edition of this contest we included a easter egg to the 2013 game Lárcenas Legacy.

In some levels and front page we put some coins like the one in the moneymeter of Lárcenas Legacy.

Installation

If you have a real Amstrad CPC: 

  1. Insert the cassette 
  2. Type RUN" and press ENTER
  3. Press PLAY
  4. Wait until fully loaded

If you have the lastest version of WinApe:

  1. Execute WinApe
  2. Select the snapshot (archive .sna) with F5 
  3. Enjoy the game
Cheats

Press the M key to pass to the next level.
